Nephrinase purified from rabbit kidney (Aubry M et al (1987), BioChemiformecell Biol 65,398-404) was used in 50mM Tris buffer pH 7.4 at a final concentration of 200 ng/mL. Substrate Dansyl-Gly- (NO)<sub>2</sub>) Phe-. beta. -Ala (Goudreau N et al (1994), Anal Biochem,219,87-95) (Km. about.37. mu.M) was dissolved in ethanol and finally used at 20. mu.M.
Neutral Aminopeptidase (APN) assay
Measurement of aminopeptidase N (APN) inhibition was performed by using the substrate L-Ala ↓ beta-NA (50. mu.M, Sigma Aldrich). 
To determine the Ki values of the different inhibitors for LTA4H, the concentration was increased (10 of the final concentration) in Tris HCl, 100mM NaCl, pH 7.450 mM, at 37 ℃<sup>-10</sup>To 10<sup>-4</sup>M) was preincubated with 0.6. mu.g/mL of recombinase for 30 minutes.
